channel.title: No More Dismemberment
channel.description: Yeah my models wont loose limbs anymore past questionable ethics. No explosion and or 50 cal they just stay together... It really was a downer because I liked how real this game was I mean if you got hit by a frag or a 50 cal in real life your limbs would pop off and go flying. It's still fun though, I'd just like to know what caused it.

item.title: No More Dismemberment
item.dc:creator: RustyNaps
item.description:
Chickenprotector:

The gib system should be enabled by default.

Might I add the gibs stopped working after the 3rd playthrough.

Read full topic

item.title: No More Dismemberment
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
The gib system should be enabled by default.

Read full topic

item.title: No More Dismemberment
item.dc:creator: RustyNaps
item.description:
Yeah my models wont loose limbs anymore past questionable ethics. No explosion and or 50 cal they just stay together… It really was a downer because I liked how real this game was I mean if you got hit by a frag or a 50 cal in real life your limbs would pop off and go flying. It’s still fun though, I’d just like to know what caused it.

Read full topic
